0: Excellent for enjoying your evening mai tai at the pool side Beach access

Pool area with the firepit area at night is wonderful
At night we enjoyed our mai tais next to the fireplace that runs along the pool
Best view rooms 40 48 overlooks ocean and pool
Nice pool area with lounge seating for the bar and polside chaise lounges great for that end of a great day cocktail
The pool is great as well as the hot tub
The pool is relaxing as is the hot tub especially since it is so close to the ocean
Wondeful view from our room outdated interior but not bad amenities good pool and hot tub
The pool and hot tub were so relaxing right near the beach
1: If we had known that construction was happening we would have not expected to arrive take a nice nap followed by a swim and hot tub with a cocktail prior to our dinner plans
Chairs Lounges set up along the beach it is a lovely beach to look at but not good for swimming
Luckily this was a perfect stay for my wife and I We adventure during the day so the closed pool was no issue
You get to use the pool at the hotel next door and you can make an appointment for the two hour increment you and your family will use the pool
The property was under renovation the courtyard and swimming pool was under construction
The rooms are gorgeous but no pool that was very disappointed wish I knew that would have stayed at the other Mariot
The rooms were nicely renovated but the pool area was closed which the website did NOT say it stated the property was renovating but not pool specific which is the main amenity I like to use
i was not told about the pool not being opened was not very happy and would have stayed somewhere else if i knew this
Pool under construction offered next door resorts pool
2: I loved swimming in the Oceanbut be wary of very strong current
the beach is beautiful but a little small and not a swimming beach because of reefs and turbulent waves and current
Unfortunately the beach is n’t a great spot to swim or spend much time in the water because it ’s really rough
Beach was too rocky to get in water and no landscaping behind pool
There is a pool and hot tub
If you check 5 times and if you are lucky you will find beach towels once at the swimming pool
The beach is windy the pool side is windy as well you can not find a place to avoid it no matter where you go
The outdoor pool that gives an infinity feel is perfect facing the choppy ocean waves
The pool was warm and the jacuzi was hot as it should be
